sense.def:
Less
pomeni manj kot prej ali manj kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: With practice it becomes less of an effort.
We had less than three miles to go.
Sixty per cent of them are aged 20 or less.
A shower uses less water than a bath.

sense.def:
Less
pomeni tudi z manj neke lastnosti kot prej ali z manj neke lastnosti kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: From this time on, I felt less guilty.
Fires occurred less frequently outside this area.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
less than before
ali
less than someone else
, tisto storimo v manjšem obsegu ali ne tako pogosto.

seg.quote: You probably use them less than I do.
The more I hear about him, the less I like him.

sense.def:
Less
pomeni tudi isto kot
minus
.

seg.quote: He earns £200 a week, less tax.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
less and less
povemo, da nekaj postaja vedno manjše po stopnji ali količini.

seg.quote: He found them less and less interesting.
They had less and less to talk about.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
less than
povemo, da nekaj nima določene lastnosti. Na primer: kadar je nekaj
less than perfect
, ni popolno.

seg.quote: It would have been less than fair.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no less
lahko poudarimo, da smo presenečeni nad pomembnostjo nekoga ali nečesa ali da jo občudujemo.

seg.quote: ...the President of the United States, no less.

sense.def:
Izraz
no less than
lahko postavimo pred določeno količino, kadar želimo povedati, da je po našem mnenju presenetljivo velika.

seg.quote: By 1880, there were no less than fifty-six coal mines.
...no less than 40 per cent of the material.
